name: 2Cool4Pool
description:
Created for the Unreal Spring-jam 2020. Its summer time and its getting hot! What better way to keep cool than to break into a crisp cold soda? Oh but wait! we dont have any money!? In this Action-RPG, you take a deep dive to collect coins from the bottom of the pool, and it ain't gonna be easy! Dive head first into Action!  Super charge your jump and bust a move before diving into the water to unlock secret ancient warrior abilities, levels, and increased Lung capacity! Will you collect enough coins to buy a soda? Play now to find out!

Cowabunga dude! (I'm very tired)

If the game feels slow or delayed, try restarting the game

Requires Mouse and Keyboard

Cheatcodes: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1E3u6O55oFyyD5WthqAcbxbmajfbizyvZKm2Qdm4N6Hc/edit?usp=sharing
